kizuna_botan_b_02:
*whisper*
I’m checking in on Atticus.\c
*whisper*
So keep your voice down, OK?[npcn:8]
kizuna_botan_b_doku_02:
I must say, the academy emporium stocks some
rather splendid wares.[npcn:23]
kizuna_botan_b_doku_03:
I admit my expectations were far lower
than warranted.[npcn:23]
kizuna_botan_b_04:
Wow. He really seems to have taken a shine to
the school store...[npcn:8]
kizuna_botan_b_05:
Doesn’t seem like he’ll notice us anytime soon,
so I guess there’s no point whispering.[npcn:8]
kizuna_botan_b_06:
You know, of all my Team Star friends, it’s Atticus
I’m worried will have the most trouble fitting in...[npcn:8]
kizuna_botan_b_doku_05:
I would very much like to acquire the limited-
edition ninja garments released today.\c
I believe you have five sets in stock, yes?[npcn:23]
kizuna_botan_b_shop_01: Ah... The ninja cosplay set, yes?
kizuna_botan_b_shop_02:
I’m sorry, dear, but someone bought the last two
from us earlier. We’re completely sold out.
kizuna_botan_b_doku_07:
If I am unable to procure those garments, why...
I... That will ruin everything![npcn:23]
kizuna_botan_b_doku_08:
It appears I have no choice but to track down
this rival patron of mine! And when I find them...[npcn:23]
kizuna_botan_b_doku_09:
I shall fix them with my piercing gaze and beg on
bended knee for the ninja garments I so crave![npcn:23]
kizuna_botan_b_07:
Whaaaaaat?! Since WHEN was Atticus this
good-looking?![npcn:8]
kizuna_botan_b_08:
Wait, no, focus! If he starts begging some kid for
their ninja outfit, people will think he’s a weirdo.\r
We should stop him, right?[npcn:8]
kizuna_botan_b_select_04: Let’s just see how this pans out
kizuna_botan_b_student_01: Oh, Don Atticus! Here you are!
kizuna_botan_b_doku_12:
About the garments I promised you so that we
might dress as ninja together...[npcn:23]
kizuna_botan_b_student_02:
Oh yeah, I got us covered! I already bought two
sets of that ninja cosplay stuff for us to wear!
kizuna_botan_b_student_03:
When I came here earlier, the shopkeeper lady
was putting them out on the shelves.\c
So I bought one for you and one for me!
kizuna_botan_b_student_04:
You know how popular these outfits are...
I was super lucky to be able to snag ’em!
kizuna_botan_b_student_05: Now c’mon! Let’s go play ninja outside!
kizuna_botan_b_doku_14: Goodness me... What a happy turn of events![npcn:23]
kizuna_botan_b_doku_15:
I shall retrieve my shuriken from my quarters
so that we might enjoy some target practice![npcn:23]
kizuna_botan_b_doku_16:
I can also use my masterful stitchery to transform
thy ninja garments into a sublime vision of poison!\r
What say you?[npcn:23]
kizuna_botan_b_doku_17: Ha ha ha! The insolence of this one![npcn:23]
kizuna_botan_b_10:
Phew... Looks like he was able to wrap up this
little escapade without making a scene.[npcn:8]
kizuna_botan_b_11:
But more importantly—Atticus has already made
a friend at school![npcn:8]
kizuna_botan_b_12:
Kinda makes me feel bad that I thought I had to
spy on him...[npcn:8]
kizuna_botan_b_13: Anyway, I guess I’ll get going. Hasta la vistar! ☆[npcn:8]
